Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Island

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Island
public class Island extends Object
This class shapes the behaviour of the game's component represented by the island tile. It can contain students, towers and Mother Nature, whose presence is reported by a boolean flag. It may consist of merged islands. It is uniquely identified by its islandIndex.

    • Island

      public Island(int index)
      Constructor creates an island instance.
      Parameters:

  • Method Details

    • getIslandIndex

      public int getIslandIndex()
      This method returns a number which identify the island.
      Returns:
      the island's index.

    • getStudents

      public ArrayList<Color> getStudents()
      Method getTowers extracts the list of students placed on the island.
      Returns:
      list containing the towers placed by players during the match.

    • getTowers

      public ArrayList<Tower> getTowers()
      Method getTowers extracts the list of towers placed on the island.
      Returns:
      ArrayList of Tower, containing the towers placed by eligible players.

    • getNumMergedIslands

      public int getNumMergedIslands()
      This method indicates the archipelago's dimension. If the return value is 1 the island has not been merged yet.
      Returns:
      the number of single islands that are part of the macro-island.

    • isMotherNature

      public boolean isMotherNature()
      This method checks Mother Nature's presence.
      Returns:
      true if Mother Nature is currently on the island tile, false otherwise.

    • setMotherNature

      public void setMotherNature(boolean motherNature)
      This method set motherNature to true or false according to whether she's on the island or not.
      Parameters:
      motherNature - : truth value regarding the mother nature's presence.

    • addTower

      public void addTower(Tower tower)
      Add a tower object to the island's towers list.
      Parameters:
      tower - : tower instance that needs to be added to the island's towers attribute.

    • addStudent

      public void addStudent(Color student)
      Add a student tile to the island's students list.
      Parameters:
      student - : student tile that needs to be added to the island's students attribute.

    • removeTower

      public ArrayList<Tower> removeTower()
      This method removes the island's towers, emptying the relative arraylist.
      Returns:
      ArrayList of Tower, containing the former island's towers.

    • merge

      public void merge(Island merged)
      This method is responsible for the merging of two eligible islands, adding the "merged" island's content to the "merging" one.
      Parameters:
      merged - island whose towers and students get added to the calling island.

    • getStudentsOfColor

      public ArrayList<Color> getStudentsOfColor(Color c)
      This method extracts the list of the students of a chosen color that are on the island
      Parameters:
      c - color of students I want to get the list of
      Returns:
      ArrayList of Color containing the Color students placed on the island

    • getOwner

      public Player getOwner()
      Method that returns the Owner of the island
      Returns:
      Player that has the major influence on the island

    • setOwner

      public void setOwner(Player owner)
      This method set a Player as owner of the island
      Parameters:
      owner - : Player that has the major influence on the island

    • getOwnerTeam

      public Tower getOwnerTeam()
      Method that returns the color of the Tower associated with the Owner of the island
      Returns:
      the color of the Tower that represents the team of the owner

    • putBan

      public void putBan()
      Method putBan adds a ban to the island ban count.

    • removeBan

      public void removeBan()
      Method removeBan removes a ban from the island ban count.

    • getBans

      public int getBans()
      Method getBans returns the island's number of bans.
      Returns:
      the island bans.

    • isBanned

      public boolean isBanned()
      Method isBanned verifies if the island has bans.
      Returns:
      true if the island has at least one ban.

    • setPropertyChangeListener

      public void setPropertyChangeListener(GameController controller)
      This method adds to the PropertyChangeSupport attribute two listeners: one for the changes to the island's towers, one for the changes to the island's towers.
      Parameters:
      controller - : the object that listens to the island's changes.
